snippet.title: Barbie™ Color Creations
snippet.description:
Available now on the App Store and Google Play: https://l.ead.me/be56jU

Barbie™ Color Creations is the perfect app for kids who love to express themselves through art and design.
● Join “Brooklyn” and “Malibu” on a colorful adventure in painting, sketching, designing and more!
● Explore an ever expanding bedroom of coloring books, tools, designs, locations and items.
● Bring Barbie’s memories to life with creative design challenges. Embark on a creative journey by customizing items and characters from your favorite Barbie movies and series, then save your designs as stickers and play with them in 2D locations.
● Earn unique rewards for completing design stories, and use them to decorate your personal studio.
● Download any drawing as an image to your device, so you can show it off to your friends and family.
● With a mindful, cozy and creative atmosphere, this app is perfect for kids who love to express their creativity and develop new ideas in a relaxing way.
● Stay up-to-date with regular updates, including new coloring packs and design challenges for endless fun and exploration.
● With Barbie Color Creations imagination and inspiration is all you need.  

If you can dream it, you can create it.
